definitions.definition: A trip into any undeveloped area to see, photograph or to hunt wild animals in their own environment .
examples: We're going on a safari in Kenya.

definitions.definition: A caravan going on a safari.
Any trip for the purpose of discovering something new or acquiring prizes or trophies.

main_definition: A trip into any undeveloped area to see, photograph or to hunt wild animals in their own environment .
secondary_definitions: A caravan going on a safari.
( by extension ) Any trip for the purpose of discovering something new or acquiring prizes or trophies.
